## Helper.toNumber() function

Converts `value` to a number.

 Lang

**Signature:**

```typescript
toNumber: (value: any) => number
```

## Parameters

<table><thead><tr><th>

Parameter


</th><th>

Type


</th><th>

Description


</th></tr></thead>
<tbody><tr><td>

value


</td><td>

any


</td><td>

The value to process.


</td></tr>
</tbody></table>
**Returns:**

number

Returns the number.

## Example

\_.toNumber(3); // =<!-- -->&gt; 3

\_.toNumber(Number.MIN\_VALUE); // =<!-- -->&gt; 5e-324

\_.toNumber(Infinity); // =<!-- -->&gt; Infinity

\_.toNumber('3'); // =<!-- -->&gt; 3
